item.title: Install Unsupported PHP using Brew
item.description: Brew by default doesn't install unsupported software versions. Like at this time, php7.3 was no longer supported. Installing it disables it and install instead the latest version (8.1.3 at this time). 1~$ brew install php@7.3 2Running `brew update --preinstall`... 3==> Auto-updated Homebrew! 4Updated 2 taps (homebrew/core and homebrew/cask). 5==> Updated Formulae 6Updated 2 formulae. 7==> Updated Casks 8Updated 6 casks. 910Error: php@7.3 has been disabled because it is a versioned formula!
